The difference in size is probably from the audio. I don't know what audio encoding he used, but I'm guessing DTS Core, which is a very lossy format, while I used DTS HD, which is entirely lossless. That should account for the difference in size, mine likely has much higher quality audio.
when i start the download the speed is 450 to 520 now is 52 25 3 1 but the upload is 45

It's likely you've caught up with the rest of the swarm, and now it's just a waiting game for me and my recruited seeds to get the data to you. I'm on a pretty limited uplink, but rest assured that it will complete, it just takes time.
Dont hit and run, please! Seed it, even 5-10KB/s helps.

@FuGGers

When I encode I let the x264 encoder chose the profile.  Typically this profile is chosen based on action scenes that require a high bit rate or a large number of macro blocks.  I tend to go for the best encode possible at the specified bit rate, this usually lands me at high, 5.0 and yes this does limit the hardware support.  However its a balance between supporting hardware players while keeping the quality very high.

I've been wanting to know this for a long time:

What is the video bitrate for blu-ray compared to this rip?????????????????????????????????????

subs are provided with English and Na'vi parts. They are not forced and if you really want to you could pull out the Na'vi parts and force only those. Audio is provided through a second torrent.  the .torrent file is included in this release or it can be searched for "Avatar.Supplemental.Audio-Spa.Fre.Por.AC3".  As for subs with other languages, I only speak fluent English, not enough Spanish or French or other language for that matter to give you an accurate subtitle rip.  If you want the raw .sup files I can provide those.

As for bit rate the average bit rate on the source averages 28 MB/s peaking out at 46 MB/s.  The average bitrate here is just around 9 MB/s.  Its basically compressed to 1/3 the original size, however this is done with the slowest and highest quality encode I could afford.
